questions.title: What is React?
questions.answers: A JavaScript library, A CSS framework, A database, A backend language

questions.title: What is JSX?
questions.answers: A JavaScript library, A CSS framework, A database, A backend language

questions.title: What is the use of useState in React?
questions.answers: A JavaScript library, A CSS framework, A database, A backend language

questions.title: What is the Virtual DOM?
questions.answers: A JavaScript library, A CSS framework, A database, A backend language

questions.title: What is the main advantage of React?
questions.answers: A JavaScript library, A CSS framework, A database, A backend language

questions.title: Which hook is used for side effects in React?
questions.answers: A JavaScript library, A CSS framework, A database, A backend language

questions.title: What is a component in React?
questions.answers: A reusable piece of UI, A CSS framework, A JavaScript library

questions.title: What is state in React?
questions.answers: An object that holds data, A component's internal data, A variable

questions.title: What is the purpose of useEffect in React?
questions.answers: To run side effects in components, To fetch data, To update state

questions.title: What is the difference between props and state in React?
questions.answers: Props are passed to components, state is internal to components

questions.title: What is a hook in React?
questions.answers: A function that lets you use React features like state and lifecycle methods

questions.title: What does ReactDOM.render do?
questions.answers: It renders React elements into the DOM

questions.title: What is the significance of keys in React lists?
questions.answers: They help React identify which items have changed, are added, or are removed

questions.title: What is a functional component in React?
questions.answers: A component written as a function, which returns JSX

questions.title: What is HTML?
questions.answers: A markup language used for structuring web content

questions.title: What does the <meta> tag do in HTML?
questions.answers: Provides metadata like description, keywords, author, and more

questions.title: What is the difference between <div> and <span> in HTML?
questions.answers: <div> is a block-level element, <span> is an inline element

questions.title: What is the purpose of the alt attribute in HTML?
questions.answers: Provides alternative text for images when they cannot be displayed

questions.title: What is CSS?
questions.answers: A style sheet language used for describing the presentation of a document written in HTML or XML

questions.title: What is the difference between inline and block elements in CSS?
questions.answers: Inline elements do not start on a new line, block elements do

questions.title: What is the purpose of the z-index property in CSS?
questions.answers: Controls the stacking order of elements

questions.title: What is Flexbox in CSS?
questions.answers: A layout model in CSS for distributing space along a single axis

questions.title: What is the box model in CSS?
questions.answers: Defines the structure of elements, including padding, margin, border, and content

questions.title: What is JavaScript?
questions.answers: A programming language used to create interactive effects within web browsers

questions.title: What is the difference between == and === in JavaScript?
questions.answers: == compares values with type coercion, === compares values without type coercion

questions.title: What is the purpose of the 'this' keyword in JavaScript?
questions.answers: Refers to the object that is currently executing the code

questions.title: What is an event listener in JavaScript?
questions.answers: A function that waits for an event to occur (e.g., click, hover) and then executes a function

questions.title: What is the DOM in JavaScript?
questions.answers: The Document Object Model, a programming interface for web documents

questions.title: What is the purpose of a promise in JavaScript?
questions.answers: Represents the eventual completion or failure of an asynchronous operation
